sentences: South Africa, for the G-77/CHINA, suggested a focus on scope, further analysis and possible solutions.
JAPAN, CANADA, AUSTRALIA and the RUSSIAN FEDERATION noted the relevance of these issues to all parties, said both negative and positive implications should be considered, and highlighted co-benefits.
CHINA said the AWG-KP must focus on Annex I parties and that this discussion should focus on adverse impacts.
The EU disagreed, preferring a balanced view.
